import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBInput, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem, MDBIcon, MDBSideNavItem, MDBSideNavCat, MDBSideNavNav, MDBSideNav, MDBContainer } from "mdbreact"; import AntiStaticBags from "../product-data/bags/AntiStaticBags"; class Home extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { toggleStateA: false, breakWidth: 1300, windowWidth: 0 }; } componentDidMount() { this.handleResize(); window.addEventListener("resize", this.handleResize); } componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener("resize", this.handleResize); } handleResize = () => this.setState({ windowWidth: window.innerWidth }); handleToggleClickA = () => { this.setState({ toggleStateA: !this.state.toggleStateA }); }; render() { const navStyle = { paddingLeft: this.state.windowWidth > this.state.breakWidth ? "210px" : "16px" }; const mainStyle = { paddingTop: "4rem", paddingLeft: this.state.windowWidth > this.state.breakWidth ? "240px" : "0" }; const specialCaseNavbarStyles = { WebkitBoxOrient: "horizontal", flexDirection: "row" }; return (
    • {/* BAGS */} Anti Static Bags Bubble Pouches Clear Poly Bags Clear Reclosable Bags Poly Bag Sealer Polypropylene Bags Poly Tubing Static Shielding Bags Vacuum Bags {/* CORRUGATED BOXES */} Box Stapler & Staples Corrugated Boxes Corrugated Bulk Containers Corrugated Pads Corrugated Mailers Easy Fold Boxes Mailing Tubes {/* CUSHIONING */} Bubble Wrap Bubble Wrap & Foam Dispenser Cushioning Foam Kraft Wrapping Paper Newsprint Wrapping Paper Packing Peanuts Tissue Wrapping Paper {/*************** LABELS AND ENVELOPES ***************/} Circle Mailing Labels Laser Labels Packing List Envelopes Shipping & Handling Labels Thermal Transfer {/*************** MAILERS ***************/} Kraft Bubble Mailer Poly Bubble Mailer Poly Mailer {/*************** STRAPPING ***************/} Poly Strapping Poly Strapping Machine Poly Strapping Tools Steel Strapping V-Boards {/*************** STRETCH FILM ***************/} Hand Stretch Wrap Machine Stretch Wrap Opaque Stretch Wrap Shrink Wrap Roll Stretch Wrap Machine Shrink Wrap System {/*************** TAPE ***************/} Carton Sealing Tape Colored Tape Custom Print Tape Filament Tape Masking Tape Office Tape & Dispenser Tape Dispenser Vinyl Tape Water-Activated Gummed Tape {/*************** TOOLS & MACHINE ***************/} Air Pillow Machine Glue Gun Poly Tubing Dispenser Utility Knife Wrapping Paper Dispenser {/*************** MISCELLANEOUS ***************/} Cable Ties Gloves & Masks Metal Truck Seal Shipping Scales Twist Ties     {/*************** NAVBAR ***************/}
